data.title: Hollywood Walk of Fame
data.meta_description: Tito Puente, Sr., born Ernesto Antonio Puente, Jr., was a Latin Jazz and Mambo musician. The son of native Puerto Ricans Ernest and Ercilia Puente, of Spanish Harlem in New York City, Puente is often credited as “El Rey” of the timbales and “The King of Latin Music”. He is best known for dance-oriented mambo […]
